physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are 'L' shaped, featuring cotton weave with embroidery work. The todaliyan are decorated with stylized depictions of figures in a vertical panel, including animals, deities, and flowers. At the bottom of each hanging, there is a sewn-on inscription.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) deities depictions (visual works) beadwork (visual works)
